FragilityCurve.Description: Unanchored and installed per manufacturer's recommendations on a carpeted floor.
FragilityCurve.Name: Modular office work stations.
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given
FragilityCurve.Notes:
This component requires user specified cost and time consequence data. Values within PACT are defaults (equal to zero) and do not represent actual consequence.
Import errors:
Warning, Data missing: E2022.001:DS1:Time: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal
Warning, Data missing: E2022.001:DS1:Time: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0
Warning, Data missing: E2022.001:DS1:Time: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0
Warning, Data missing: E2022.001:DS1:Time: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5
Warning, Data missing: E2022.001:DS1:Cost: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal
Warning, Data missing: E2022.001:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0
Warning, Data missing: E2022.001:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0
Warning, Data missing: E2022.001:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5

DamageState.Description: Wall units need to be adjusted and straightened. Some elements are bent / damaged and need to be replaced.

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Adjust and or straightened wall units. Replace damaged units. Assume a repair cost of 5% of the replacement value.
